contents: Article 4 (Composition) ① The committee shall be composed of the following members. Revised on January 31, 2019. 1. 1 chairperson 2. Up to 3 vice chairpersons *3. 9 to 15 members (including the chairman and vice-chairman) ② The committee shall have one secretary, who is appointed by the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Chairman) from among the staff of the Sports Council. Revised on January 24, 2022. ③ The members of the committee shall include the following persons and shall be appointed at the general meeting in consultation with the Minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism. However, if the appointment authority is delegated to the chairman by a resolution of the general meeting, the chairman shall form a recommendation committee including a majority of outsiders and make the appointment after hearing their opinions. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2022. 1. 24. 1. A person who has worked as a judge, prosecutor, or lawyer for more than 5 years 2. A person who majored in sports or law-related fields and worked at a university or accredited research institute for 5 years 3. A person with more than 10 years of experience working in the sports field 4. A human rights expert with more than 5 years of experience working in the related field ④ Those who fall under Articles 43 (3) and 45 (3) of the Articles of Incorporation Public officials belonging to the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism cannot become members of the committee. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2019. 12. 20., 2022. 1. 24. ⑤ Efforts should be made to ensure that the ratio of specific genders among committee members does not exceed 70% of the registered members. Newly established 2019. 1. 31., 2020. 2. 11. ⑥ Candidates for appointment as members must submit a preliminary diagnosis of professional ethics in Form No. 6 to the recommendation committee. Newly established 2019. 12. 20.
